name: Phase-Discretized Mass Model (ST Correction)
description: Improvement of mass prediction accuracy using non-linear ST (Smallest Torsion) correction and phase-randomization.

hypothesis.H0: Phase-discretized ST invariants do not explain fermion mass residuals.
hypothesis.H1: Non-linear ST correction terms (Phase-Discretized) explain mass residuals with R^2 > 0.70.

data_requirements.description: Fermion mass residuals and KnotInfo ST invariants.

test_method: Non-linear regression analysis of mass residuals against discretized ST invariants using Phase-Randomized Time Simulation.
